headline: TikTok | Reels | Shorts | YT | Podcast Video Editor || ADOBE PREMIERE PRO || I BRING BORING VIDEOS TO LIFE!!
summary:
With over 4 years of experience, I excel in video editing, delivering top-quality projects across diverse genres. From marketing content to brand storytelling, I ensure each piece resonates with its audience. Proficient in Premiere Pro, I bring ideas to life with attention to detail and creative flair. Collaboration is key; I value teamwork and feedback to exceed expectations. In tune with industry trends, I innovate to engage viewers effectively. Let's create captivating videos together!

Skills - I have experience in Adobe premiere pro. After effects, Da-vinci, Capcut software.

Career Goals - To be work in the top notch companies, brands and social media persons in every niche to help them and in return gain some entrepreneurship skills for me which will enhance me as a person.

Some examples include:
I worked for a video agency from Argentina, I worked with a team of 10+ people where I helped them to add motion graphics and some animation to the videos to get an extra edge from others.

As a Lead Video editor for my current client i.e. Taimour Zaman Canada based  (Banking Entrepreneur). I manage all his video edits for Youtube and doing the SEO part as well. I worked with his social media team and do time management skills for editing and uploading the videos. I helped his channel to grow from 1k subscribers to 3.5k subscriber just in 3-4 months of work.

As a Video editor with the US based organization i.e. The Venture project, I provide them exciting content ideas and bold vision in video editing field. I edit Podcast videos as well for this organization remotely which  helps me to gain an extra s

In my extensive portfolio, you'll find a diverse range of projects spanning various genres and industries. From marketing videos that elevate brand presence to educational content that informs and inspires, I thrive on the challenge of translating concepts into impactful visuals. My expertise, coupled with a keen eye for design and motion graphics, allows me to breathe life into every edit, ensuring a seamless and visually arresting final product.

I love connecting with new and right person with spectrum network and to be a team player. You can reach me at 13ime043ravi@gmail.com

accomplishment_projects.title: Tiktok & Reel Edit
accomplishment_projects.description: Editing a video involves crafting a cohesive narrative from raw footage. Editors trim, arrange, and enhance visuals, audio, and effects to convey the intended message or story. This process ensures seamless transitions, visual appeal, and emotional impact, resulting in a polished, engaging video ready for presentation or publication.

accomplishment_projects.title: Youtube (Long form content)
accomplishment_projects.description: "Captivate your audience with stunning long-form video edits! Elevate your YouTube channel with engaging storytelling, seamless transitions, and professional polish. Let your content shine with our expert editing services, turning every video into an immersive experience your viewers won't forget. Stand out from the crowd and make a lasting impression with our tailored video editing solutions!"

Ravi has been great to work with! Responsive to my needs and creative with his execution. I'm looking forward to continued collaboration with him for my social media content and definitely recommend others to use his services

Mialisa Garnes



Ravi has been a godsend for me! I am a multimedia designer, so I already have high design expectations for all of the work I outsource. Ravi continues to exceed my expectations every time! What I value the most about him is that he always comes up with recommendations or suggestions each week to make the content even better. He is also up to date with the different platforms and their algorithms, which keeps me on top of my game regarding video content!
